commands.name: open
commands.help: Create local default session and start daemon skeleton.
commands.usage: rdc open [CAPTURE] [--preload] [--proxy HOST[:PORT]] [--remote HOST[:PORT]] [--listen [ADDR]:PORT] [--connect HOST:PORT] [--token TEXT]

commands.name: close
commands.help: Close daemon-backed session.

commands.name: status
commands.help: Show current daemon-backed session status.

commands.name: goto
commands.help: Update current event id via daemon.

commands.name: capture
commands.help: Execute application and capture a frame.
commands.usage:
rdc capture <EXECUTABLE> [ARGS...] [-o OUTPUT]
  [--frame N] [--trigger] [--timeout N] [--wait-for-exit]
  [--keep-alive] [--auto-open] [--api-validation] [--callstacks]
  [--hook-children] [--ref-all-resources]
  [--soft-memory-limit N] [--delay-for-debugger N]
  [--api TEXT] [--list-apis] [--json]

commands.name: doctor
commands.help: Run environment checks for rdc-cli.

commands.name: info
commands.help: Show capture metadata.

commands.name: stats
commands.help: Show per-pass breakdown, top draws, largest resources.

commands.name: events
commands.help: List all events.
commands.usage: rdc events [--type TEXT] [--filter TEXT] [--limit INTEGER] [--range TEXT] [--no-header] [--json] [--jsonl] [-q]

commands.name: draws
commands.help: List draw calls.

commands.name: event
commands.help: Show single API call detail.

commands.name: draw
commands.help: Show draw call detail.

commands.name: log
commands.help: Show debug/validation messages from the capture.

commands.name: counters
commands.help: Query GPU performance counters.

commands.name: pipeline
commands.help: Show pipeline summary for current or specified EID.

commands.name: bindings
commands.help: Show bound resources per shader stage.

commands.name: resources
commands.help: List all resources.

commands.name: resource
commands.help: Show details of a specific resource.

commands.name: usage
commands.help: Show resource usage (which events read/write a resource).

commands.name: shader
commands.help: Show shader metadata for a stage at EID.

commands.name: shaders
commands.help: List unique shaders in capture.

commands.name: shader-map
commands.help: Output EID-to-shader mapping as TSV.

commands.name: search
commands.help: Search shader disassembly text for PATTERN (regex).

commands.name: passes
commands.help: List render passes.

commands.name: pass
commands.help: Show detail for a single render pass by index or name.

commands.name: texture
commands.help: Export texture as PNG.

commands.name: buffer
commands.help: Export buffer raw data.

commands.name: rt
commands.help: Export render target as PNG.
commands.usage: rdc rt [EID] [-o PATH] [--target INTEGER] [--raw] [--overlay CHOICE] [--width INTEGER] [--height INTEGER]

commands.name: mesh
commands.help: Export post-transform mesh as OBJ.

commands.name: snapshot
commands.help: Export a complete rendering state snapshot for a draw event.

commands.name: pixel
commands.help: Query pixel history at (X, Y) for the current or specified event.

commands.name: pick-pixel
commands.help: Read pixel color at (X, Y) from the current render target.

commands.name: tex-stats
commands.help: Show texture min/max statistics and optional histogram.

commands.name: debug pixel
commands.help: Debug pixel shader at (X, Y) for event EID.
commands.usage: rdc debug pixel <EID> <X> <Y> [--trace] [--dump-at INTEGER] [--sample INTEGER] [--primitive INTEGER] [--json] [--no-header]

commands.name: debug vertex
commands.help: Debug vertex shader for vertex VTX_ID at event EID.

commands.name: debug thread
commands.help: Debug compute shader thread at workgroup (GX,GY,GZ) thread (TX,TY,TZ).

commands.name: shader-encodings
commands.help: List available shader encodings for this capture.

commands.name: shader-build
commands.help: Build a shader from source file.

commands.name: shader-replace
commands.help: Replace shader at EID/STAGE with a built shader.

commands.name: shader-restore
commands.help: Restore original shader at EID/STAGE.

commands.name: shader-restore-all
commands.help: Restore all replaced shaders and free built resources.

commands.name: assert-pixel
commands.help: Assert pixel RGBA at (x, y) matches expected value within tolerance.

commands.name: assert-image
commands.help: Compare two images pixel-by-pixel.

commands.name: assert-clean
commands.help: Assert capture log has no messages at or above given severity.

commands.name: assert-count
commands.help: Assert a capture metric satisfies a numeric comparison.

commands.name: assert-state
commands.help: Assert pipeline state value at EID matches expected.

commands.name: diff
commands.help: Compare two RenderDoc captures side-by-side.
commands.usage: rdc diff <CAPTURE-A> <CAPTURE-B> [--draws] [--resources] [--passes] [--stats] [--framebuffer] [--pipeline MARKER] [--json] [--format CHOICE] [--shortstat] [--no-header] [--verbose] [--timeout FLOAT] [--target INTEGER] [--threshold FLOAT] [--eid INTEGER] [--diff-output PATH]

categories.name: Target Control
categories.description: Live interaction with a running RenderDoc-injected target process.

commands.name: attach
commands.help: Attach to a running RenderDoc target by ident.

commands.name: capture-trigger
commands.help: Trigger a capture on the attached target.

commands.name: capture-list
commands.help: List captures from the attached target.

commands.name: capture-copy
commands.help: Copy a capture from the target to a local path.

categories.name: Capture Metadata
categories.description: Inspect capture file metadata without full replay.

commands.name: thumbnail
commands.help: Export capture thumbnail.

commands.name: gpus
commands.help: List GPUs available at capture time.

commands.name: sections
commands.help: List all embedded sections.

commands.name: section
commands.help: Extract named section contents.

commands.name: ls
commands.help: List VFS directory contents.

commands.name: cat
commands.help: Output VFS leaf node content.

commands.name: tree
commands.help: Display VFS subtree structure.

categories.name: Remote
categories.description: Connect to a remote RenderDoc server for remote capture and replay.

commands.name: serve
commands.help: Launch renderdoccmd remoteserver for remote replay.

commands.name: remote connect
commands.help: Connect to a remote RenderDoc server.

commands.name: remote list
commands.help: List capturable applications on a remote host.

commands.name: remote capture
commands.help: Capture on a remote host and transfer to local.
commands.usage: rdc remote capture <APP> -o <PATH> [--url TEXT] [--args TEXT] [--workdir TEXT] [--frame INTEGER] [--timeout FLOAT] [--api-validation] [--callstacks] [--hook-children] [--ref-all-resources] [--soft-memory-limit INTEGER] [--keep-remote] [--json]

commands.name: count
commands.help: Output a single integer count to stdout.

commands.name: completion
commands.help: Generate shell completion script.

commands.name: script
commands.help: Execute a Python script inside the daemon process.

commands.name: install-skill
commands.help: Install rdc-cli skill files to ~/.claude/skills/rdc-cli/.
